revised_title: Camel Trypanosome Identification and Biometric Method Analysis
tldr: The author investigates a camel trypanosome and examines the biometric method of diagnosing trypanosomes. The trypanosome appears to be more similar to T. evansi than T. brucei based on morphology and disease progression in experimental animals. The author also discusses the limitations and usefulness of the biometric method in diagnosing trypanosomes.
